MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD2 and TD3 postcode areas of Lauder and Gordon. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.18pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still carrying out investigations onsite to locate the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.40pm on 4th December 2020.
